prompts: Create a quirky ground-type Pokemon that surprises everyone with its hidden abilities.
I want a small, cute Pokemon that pops out of the ground when you least expect it.
Generate an adorable creature that can dig tunnels faster than any other Pokemon.
Make a Pokemon that combines earth and surprise, with a distinctive round shape.
Imagine a playful Pokemon that thrives in urban areas and loves to hide underground.
Design a Pokemon that looks like a little mole with a bright orange body.
Show me a Pokemon that can burrow into the ground and emerge out of nowhere.
